mapper.update: update customer set customerName = #{customername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customerSex = #{customersex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UserID = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Brithday = #{brithday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMMENT = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where cuID = #{cuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select cuID, customerName, customerSex, UserID, Password, Tel, Brithday, Address, COMMENT from customer where cuID = #{cuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select cuID, customerName, customerSex, UserID, Password, Tel, Brithday, Address, COMMENT from customer
